title: Introduction to Quantum Computing
description: Start your quantum journey with the basics of quantum mechanics and quantum computing principles.
author: IBM Qiskit Team

title: Quantum Circuits and Gates
description: Learn to build and visualize quantum circuits using Qiskit's comprehensive gate library.
author: Dr. Maria Rodriguez

title: Grover's Search Algorithm
description: Implement and understand Grover's quantum search algorithm for unstructured database search.
author: Prof. Alex Chen

title: Quantum Machine Learning Basics
description: Explore the intersection of quantum computing and machine learning with practical examples.
author: Dr. Sarah Quantum

title: Quantum Error Correction
description: Understand quantum error correction codes and their implementation in near-term quantum devices.
author: IBM Research Team

title: Variational Quantum Eigensolver (VQE)
description: Learn to find ground state energies of quantum systems using the VQE algorithm.
author: Prof. Lisa Wang

title: Quantum Teleportation Protocol
description: Implement the famous quantum teleportation protocol and understand quantum entanglement.
author: Dr. John Smith

title: QAOA for Optimization Problems
description: Solve combinatorial optimization problems using the Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm.
author: Dr. Emily Johnson
